short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate student cards in PDF format from module and seminar group data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is exclusively for colleagues from the University of Westminster and partner institutions. 

This extension generates PDF student cards based on module or seminar group data from the University's Student Records System (SITS).

Usage:
Navigate to the SRS Web page and view your student list for the whole module or seminar group.
Launch the Student Card Extension. Click the "Generate PDF" button to generate your student cards and download it in PDF format.

Created by Anne-Gaelle Colom, University of Westminster.
